member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoPacketBase.ToJObject
member.summary: Retreive the basic jobject that was send by the server. Its not recommended to use this however the JObject allows accessing properties are not available in the library

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession
member.summary: `ArchipelagoSession` is the overarching class to access and modify and respond to the multiworld state

member.summary: Provides access to the underlying websocket, so send or receive messages

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.Items
member.summary: Provides simplified methods to receive items

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.Locations
member.summary: Provides way to mark locations as checked

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.Players
member.summary: Provides information about all players in the multiworld

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.DataStorage
member.summary: Provides access to a server side data storage to share and store values across sessions and players

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.ConnectionInfo
member.summary: Provides information about your current connection

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.RoomState
member.summary: Provides information about the current state of the server

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.MessageLog
member.summary: Provides simplified handlers to receive messages about events that happen in the multiworld

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.ConnectAsync
member.summary: Connect the websocket to the server Will wait a few seconds to retrieve the RoomInfoPacket, if the request timesout the task will be canceled
member.returns: The roominfo send from the server

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.LoginAsync(System.String,System.String,Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags,System.Version,System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempt to log in to the Archipelago server by opening a websocket connection and sending a Connect packet. Determining success for this attempt is done by attaching a listener to Socket.PacketReceived and listening for a Connected packet.
member.param: The game this client is playing.
The slot name of this client.
The minimum AP protocol version this client supports.
Informs the AP server how you want ReceivedItem packets to be sent to you.
The tags this client supports.
The uuid of this client.
The password to connect to this AP room.
Decides if the result will contain any slot data
member.returns: if the connection is succeeded and the server accepted the login attempt. if the connection to the server failed in some way.
member.remarks: The connect attempt is synchronous and will lock for up to 5 seconds as it attempts to connect to the server. Most connections are instantaneous however the timeout is 5 seconds before it returns .

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSession.TryConnectAndLogin(System.String,System.String,Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags,System.Version,System.String[],System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempt to log in to the Archipelago server by opening a websocket connection and sending a Connect packet. Determining success for this attempt is done by attaching a listener to Socket.PacketReceived and listening for a Connected packet.
member.param: The game this client is playing.
The slot name of this client.
The minimum AP protocol version this client supports.
Informs the AP server how you want ReceivedItem packets to be sent to you.
The tags this client supports.
The uuid of this client.
The password to connect to this AP room.
Decides if the result will contain any slot data
member.returns: if the connection is succeeded and the server accepted the login attempt. if the connection to the server failed in some way.
member.remarks: The connect attempt is synchronous and will lock for up to 5 seconds as it attempts to connect to the server. Most connections are instantaneous however the timeout is 5 seconds before it returns .

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSessionFactory
member.summary: Factory to initiate a new ArchipelagoSession, the base object to communicate with an Archipelago Server

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSessionFactory.CreateSession(System.Uri)
member.summary: Creates an object which facilitates all communication to the Archipelago server.
member.param: The full URI to the Archipelago server, including scheme, hostname, and port.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.ArchipelagoSessionFactory.CreateSession(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Creates an object which facilitates all communication to the Archipelago server.
member.param: The hostname of the Archipelago server, can include protocol and port. Ex: `archipelago.gg`, `localhost`, `localhost:38281` or `ws://archipelago.gg:46376`
(Optional) The port number which the Archipelago server is hosted on. Defaults to: 38281, will be ignored if the port is added to the hostname

member.summary: The name of the player who sent the DeathLink

member.summary: The full text to print for players receiving the DeathLink. Can be null

member.summary: A DeathLink object that gets sent and received via bounce packets.
member.param: Name of the player sending the DeathLink
Optional reason for the DeathLink. Since this is optional it should generally include a name as if this entire text is what will be displayed

member.summary: creates and returns a for this .

member.summary: Creates event for clients to hook into and decide what to do with the received

member.name: E:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.BounceFeatures.DeathLink.DeathLinkService.OnDeathLinkReceived
member.summary: Delegate event that supplies the created whenever one is received from the server as a bounce packet.

member.summary: Formats and sends a Bounce packet using the provided object.
member.param: object containing the information of the death which occurred. Must at least contain the .
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.BounceFeatures.DeathLink.DeathLinkService.EnableDeathLink
member.summary: Adds "DeathLink" to your 's tags and opts you in to receiving events

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.BounceFeatures.DeathLink.DeathLinkService.DisableDeathLink
member.summary: Removes the "DeathLink" tag from your and opts out of further events

member.summary: Json Converter for archipelago packets

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidSlot
member.summary: Indicates that the sent 'name' field did not match any auth entry on the server.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidGame
member.summary: Indicates that a correctly named slot was found, but the game for it mismatched.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.SlotAlreadyTaken
member.summary: Indicates a connection with a different uuid is already established.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.IncompatibleVersion
member.summary: IncompatibleVersion indicates a version mismatch.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidPassword
member.summary: InvalidPassword indicates the wrong, or no password when it was required, was sent.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ConnectionRefusedError.InvalidItemsHandling
member.summary: InvalidItemsHandling indicates a wrong value type or flag combination was sent.

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope
member.summary: Scope for DataStorage keys

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Global
member.summary: Keys in this scope are shared with all clients

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Game
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients that connect under the same game as you connected with

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Team
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients on your team

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.Slot
member.summary: Keys in this scope are with shared with clients connected to your slot

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope.ReadOnly
member.summary: Keys in this scope are read-only and can only be updated by the server

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemFlags
member.summary: Enum flags that describe special properties of the Item

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemFlags.None
member.summary: Nothing special about this item

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemFlags.Advancement
member.summary: Indicates the item can unlock logical advancement

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemFlags.NeverExclude
member.summary: Indicates the item is important but not in a way that unlocks advancement

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemFlags.Trap
member.summary: Indicates the item is a trap

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags
member.summary: Indicates to the server how the client would like to get ReceivedItems packets.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.NoItems
member.summary: Don't get any ReceivedItems packets from the server.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.RemoteItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for items being granted to you by others.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.IncludeOwnItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for items which you picked up in your own world. Automatically includes RemoteItems option as it is required to set this.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.IncludeStartingInventory
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for your starting inventory. Automatically includes RemoteItems option as it is required to set this.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.ItemsHandlingFlags.AllItems
member.summary: Get ReceivedItems packets for all remote items, items in your world, and starting inventory granted to you.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.Text
member.summary: Regular text content. this is the default type and as such may be omitted.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.PlayerId
member.summary: Player ID of someone on your team, should be resolved to Player Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.PlayerName
member.summary: Player Name, could be a player within a multiplayer game or from another team, not ID resolvable

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.ItemId
member.summary: Item ID, should be resolved to Item Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.ItemName
member.summary: Item Name, not currently used over network, but supported by reference Clients.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.LocationId
member.summary: Location ID, should be resolved to Location Name

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.LocationName
member.summary: Location Name, not currently used over network, but supported by reference Clients.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.EntranceName
member.summary: Entrance Name. No ID mapping exists.

member.name: F:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.JsonMessagePartType.Color
member.summary: Regular text that should be colored. Only type that will contain color data.

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.OperationType
member.summary: The type of DataStorage operation

member.summary: Returns true if the socket believes it is connected to the host. Does not emit a ping to determine if the connection is stable.

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper
member.summary: Provides access to a server side data storage to share and store values across sessions and players

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.Item(Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Enums.Scope,System.String)
member.summary: Stored or retrieves a value from the server side data storage. Assignment operations like = or *= will run asynchronously on server only The retrievals are done synchronously however this storage is implemented using deferred execution.
member.param: The scope of the key
The key for which the value should be stored or retrieved
member.returns: A value

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.Item(System.String)
member.summary: Stored or retrieves a value from the server side data storage. Assignment operations like = or *= will run asynchronously on server only The retrievals are done synchronously however this storage is implemented using deferred execution.
member.param: The key under which the value should be stored or retrieved
member.returns: A value

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.GetHints(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieves all unlocked hints for the specified player slot and team
member.param: the slot id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's slot if left empty
the team id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's team if left empty
member.returns: An array of unlocked hints or null if the slot or team does not exist

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.GetHintsAsync(System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Retrieves all unlocked hints for the specified player slot and team
member.param: the slot id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's slot if left empty
the team id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's team if left empty
member.returns: An array of unlocked hints or null if the slot or team does not exist

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.TrackHints(System.Action{Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.Hint[]},System.Boolean,System.Nullable{System.Int32},System.Nullable{System.Int32})
member.summary: Sets a callback to be called with all updates to the unlocked hints for the specified player slot and team
member.param: the method to call with the updated hints
should the currently unlocked hints be retrieved or just the updates
the slot id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's slot if left empty
the team id of the player to request hints for, defaults to the current player's team if left empty

member.returns: An Dictionary with string keys, and custom defined values, the keys and values differ per game

member.returns: An Dictionary with string keys, and custom defined values, the keys and values differ per game

member.summary: Provides way to mark locations as checked

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.CompleteLocationChecks(System.Int64[])
member.summary: Submit the provided location ids as checked locations.
member.param: Location ids which have been checked.
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.CompleteLocationChecksAsync(System.Int64[])
member.summary: Submit the provided location ids as checked locations.

member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.ScoutLocationsAsync(System.Boolean,System.Int64[])
member.summary: Ask the server for the items which are present in the provided location ids.
member.param: If true, creates a free hint for these locations.
The locations ids which are to be scouted.
member.remarks: Repeated calls of this method before a LocationInfo packet is received will cause the stored callback to be overwritten with the most recent call. It is recommended you chain calls to this method within the callbacks themselves or call this only once.
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.ScoutLocationsAsync(System.Int64[])
member.summary: Ask the server for the items which are present in the provided location ids.
member.param: The locations ids which are to be scouted.
member.remarks: Repeated calls of this method before a LocationInfo packet is received will cause the stored callback to be overwritten with the most recent call. It is recommended you chain calls to this method within the callbacks themselves or call this only once.
member.exception: The websocket connection is not alive.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.GetLocationIdFromName(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Get the Id of a location from its name. Useful when a game knows its locations by name but not by Archipelago Id.
member.param: The game to look up the locations from
The name of the location to check the Id for. Must match the contents of the datapackage.
member.returns: Returns the locationId for the location name that was given or -1 if no location was found.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.LocationCheckHelper.GetLocationNameFromId(System.Int64)
member.summary: Get the name of a location from its id. Useful when receiving a packet and it is necessary to find the name of the location.
member.param: The Id of the location to look up the name for. Must match the contents of the datapackage.
member.returns: Returns the locationName for the provided locationId, or null if no such location is found.

member.summary: Check whether there are any items in the queue.
member.returns: True if the queue is not empty, otherwise false.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.ReceivedItemsHelper.PeekItem
member.summary: Peek the next item on the queue to be handled. The item will remain on the queue until dequeued with .
member.returns: The next item to be handled as a , or null if no such item is found.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.ReceivedItemsHelper.PeekItemName
member.summary: Peek the name of next item on the queue to be handled.
member.returns: The name of the item as a string, or null if no such item is found.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.ReceivedItemsHelper.DequeueItem
member.summary: Dequeues and returns the next item on the queue to be handled.
member.returns: The next item to be handled as a .

member.summary: An enumeration containing the possible release command permission.

member.summary: Uniquely identifying name of this generation

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.RoomStateHelper.RoomInfoSendTime
member.summary: Time stamp of we first connected to the server, and the server send us the RoomInfoPacker. Send for time synchronization if wanted for things like the DeathLink Bounce.

member.summary: Denotes special features or capabilities that the server is capable of.

member.summary: Your team number.

member.summary: Your slot number on your team.

member.summary: Contains a slot data, differs per game

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.AdminCommandResultLogMessage
member.summary: An admin command result message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `AdminCommandResultLogMessage` is send in response to a client using `!admin` command

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ChatLogMessage
member.summary: An chat message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `ChatLogMessage` is send in response to a client chatting some message

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ChatLogMessage.Message
member.summary: The message that was chatted

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.CollectLogMessage
member.summary: An collect message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `CollectLogMessage` is send in response to a client collecting their items

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.CommandResultLogMessage
member.summary: An command result message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `CommandResultLogMessage` is send in response to a client using an `!` command (e.g. !status)

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.CountdownLogMessage
member.summary: A countdown message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence countdown message also contains the remaining seconds for the countdown for more specific processing

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.GoalLogMessage
member.summary: An goal message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `GoalLogMessage` is send in response to a client completing their goal

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.HintItemSendLogMessage
member.summary: An item hint message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `HintItemSendLogMessage` is send in response to a client hinting for an item. Item hint messages contain additional information about the item that was sent for more specific processing

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.HintItemSendLogMessage.IsFound
member.summary: Indicates if the location of this item was already checked

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ItemCheatLogMessage
member.summary: An item cheat message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. Item cheat messages contain additional information about the item that was in response to an `!getitem` command

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ItemSendLogMessage.ReceivingPlayerSlot
member.summary: The player slot number of the player who received the item

member.summary: The player slot number of the player who sent the item

member.summary: The player who received the item

member.summary: The player who sent the item

member.summary: Checks if the Receiver is the current connected player

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ItemSendLogMessage.IsSenderTheActivePlayer
member.summary: True if the Sender is the current connected player

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.ItemSendLogMessage.IsRelatedToActivePlayer
member.summary: True if either the Receiver or Sender share any slot groups (e.g. itemlinks) with the current connected player

member.summary: The Item that was send

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.JoinLogMessage.Tags
member.summary: The tags used by the client, tags are used for certain functionality that is shared across the mutliworld (e.g. DeathLink)

member.summary: An leave message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence. The `LeaveLogMessage` is send in response to a client disconnecting from the multiworld

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.LogMessage
member.summary: A message to display to the user, consisting of an array of message parts to form a sentence This is the base class for all LogMessage's

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.LogMessage.Parts
member.summary: Different part of a message that should be used to build a sentence The order of the parts is the order the different sections should appear in

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.LogMessage.ToString
member.summary: Uses the Parts to form a correct sentence
member.returns: the sentence this LogMessage is representing

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.PlayerSpecificLogMessage.Player
member.summary: The player information about the player this message is concerning

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.PlayerSpecificLogMessage.IsActivePlayer
member.summary: True if the player this message is concerning is the current connected player

member.name: P:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.MessageLog.Messages.PlayerSpecificLogMessage.IsRelatedToActivePlayer

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.Color
member.summary: Polyfill for System.Drawing.Color for games on runtimes which do not supply a `System.Drawing.dll`. Not focused on memory or computation efficiency, we just need something that works reasonably well. Transparency/alpha channel is not handled.

member.summary: Initializes a value in the server side data storage Will not override any existing value, only set the default value if none existed
member.param: The default value for the key

member.summary: Initializes a value in the server side data storage Will not override any existing value, only set the default value if none existed

member.summary: Retrieves the value of a certain key from server side data storage.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.DataStorageElement.GetAsync
member.summary: Retrieves the value of a certain key from server side data storage.

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.DataStorageElement.To``1
member.summary: Retrieves the value from the server and casts it to the given type Cannot be used in combination with other operators
member.returns: The value from server as the given type
member.exception: DataStorageElement.To() cannot be used together with other operations on the DataStorageElement Other operations include =, +=, /=, + etc
The websocket connection is not alive

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.DataStorageElement.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the current object.
member.returns: A string that represents the current object.

member.summary: Enum flags that describe special properties of the Item

member.summary: Provides a method to be called when a certain DataStorage operation completes

member.name: M:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Models.Callback.Add(Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Helpers.DataStorageHelper.DataStorageUpdatedHandler)
member.summary: Adds a callback to the current sequence of operations. This callback will be called only once after the server is done processing your operations. This is useful in-case you need to know the results of your operations when they depend on the current state of the server
member.param: The method to be called with the oldValue at the start of your operation and the newValue after your operation completed

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Packets.RoomUpdatePacket
member.summary: Sent when there is a need to update information about the present game session, All arguments for this packet are nullable, only the properties that are not null contain changes.

member.name: T:Archipelago.MultiClient.Net.Packets.UnknownPacket
member.summary: Packet is used whenever the server sends us a packet that we didnt implement in the library
